This class represents the core logic of a Calculator.

CorsConfig
 
Divides
This class represents the arithmetic division operation "/".
Evaluator
Evaluation is a concrete visitor that serves to compute and evaluate the results of arithmetic expressions.
Exp
 
Expression
Expression is an abstract class that represents arithmetic expressions.
ExpressionParser
The ExpressionParser class is responsible for parsing and evaluating arithmetic expressions written in various notations: Infix, Prefix, Postfix, or Auto-detected.
ExpressionParser.Display
Display mode: decimal or fraction output
ExpressionParser.Mode
Angle mode: radians or degrees
ExpressionParser.Notation
Notation mode: how the expression is written
GlobalExceptionHandler
 
IllegalConstruction
Exception that will be used when an incorrectly constructed arithmetic expression is encountered.
IntegerValue
 
Inverse
Unary inverse operation: 1/x.
Ln
 
Log
 
Main
 
Minus
This class represents the arithmetic operation "-" for subtraction.
MyInfixParser
The MyInfixParser class provides functionality for parsing and evaluating arithmetic expressions written in infix notation.
MyInfixParser.Node
Represents a node in the expression tree.
MyNumber
MyNumber is a concrete class that represents arithmetic numbers, which are a special kind of Expressions, just like operations are.
MyPostfixParser
The MyPostfixParser class provides parsing and evaluation of arithmetic expressions written in a custom Postfix (Reverse Polish) notation.
MyPrefixParser
The MyPrefixParser class evaluates arithmetic expressions written in prefix notation.
Notation
Enumeration of the 3 ways to represent an arithmetic expression as a String:
NumericValue
 
Operation
Operation is an abstract class that represents arithmetic operations, which are a special kind of Expressions, just like numbers are.
Percent
 
Plus
This class represents the arithmetic sum operation "+".
Power
 
PrintVisitor
 
RationalValue
 
RealValue
Represents a real number value with fixed decimal precision (scale).
Root
 
Times
This class represents the arithmetic multiplication operation "*".
TokenizerPostfix
The MyPostfixParser class provides parsing and evaluation of arithmetic expressions written in a custom Postfix (Reverse Polish) notation.
TokenizerPrefix
The TokenizerPrefix class is responsible for parsing and tokenizing a prefix arithmetic expression into a list of individual tokens.
UnaryOperation
 
Visitor
Visitor design pattern
